author: urn:li:organization:123456
text: Proud to unveil our new circular packaging prototype made from 90% recycled content. Huge thanks to @OceanPlastics for partnering with us to make reusable packaging mainstream. #circular #packaging #innovation

author: urn:li:organization:123456
text: We’re hiring! Join the CIRCPACK team shaping the future of sustainable supply chains. Multiple roles in product, data science, and marketing. Apply today. #hiring #careers #sustainability

author: urn:li:organization:123456
text: Circularity Summit recap: three takeaways for brands scaling refill models. We hosted a packed booth, shared a live demo, and filmed customer interviews. Full download inside. #events #circpacksummit #refill

author: urn:li:organization:123456
text: Thrilled to win the Global Packaging Award for our refill-ready pouch. Recognition like this proves circular design can be beautiful, functional, and profitable. #awards #design #packaging

author: urn:li:organization:123456
text: New customer story: how PureFresh cut virgin plastic by 65% using CIRCPACK logistics. Deep dive into operations, cost savings, and consumer response. #partnerships #customerstory

author: urn:li:organization:123456
text: Fresh insights from our 2025 Circular Packaging Benchmark—download the report to see which sectors are ahead on reuse, refill, and recycled content adoption. #thoughtleadership #report
